Job Posting:165642 - Position: S25 Fullstack Developer Intern 165642B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/05/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/15/2025 09:29 AM Expired ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Coveo 3175 des Quatre-Bourgeois, Suite 200 Quebec City G1W 2K7 QC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2025 - Summer S25 Fullstack Developer Intern 165642B Co-op Position Quebec City, QC Canada 4 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Do you dream to join a team that pushes the limits of innovation and develops cutting edge solutions? We are looking for people passionate about fullstack development to join one of our Connectivity teams. You'll work alongside experts in the team to play a key role in the optimization, evolution and performance of our connectors and integrations. Your work will be essential to ensure that these solutions are optimized, scalable, available, and expertly designed. • The Service Connectivity team develops and maintains our solution that crawls all the needed content and the related permissions from the different Service platforms such as Salesforce, Atlassian, Zendesk, Khoros, Dynamics. • The Websites Connectivity team's mission is to develop the generic connectors used for indexing from Web and Sitemap, covering everything from the configuration UI to the backend crawler. Not only that, they also manage the Sitecore integration. What your typical day would look like: • You start your day off with a team meeting (scrum) to track the progress on the team's different projects and elevate each other by sharing innovative ideas. • You take ownership of your current projects and start your day with some coding! • You then make sure to test your code like a pro for it to deliver tangible value. • After lunch, you take on some of your team's backlog tasks. Your manager encourages you to do the right thing and help the team! • Before the day ends, you're asked to conduct some code reviews for your colleagues! Feedback is valued at Coveo, we thrive when listening and learning from each other. Here's what will qualify you for the role: • You are currently studying Software Engineering or Computer Science in a Bachelor or Master's program. • You have experience with .Net/C#, Java, TypeScript, ReactJS. • You have a strong sense of ownership and are proud of what you create. You strive to grow and aren't afraid to ask questions. • And the cherry on top that will make you stand out: • You have completed an internship in a similar role. • You've participated in some hackathons and/or have a few personal projects. You have a head full of ideas; you're passionate about the tech industry and lead with a proactive mindset. • You don't need to check every single box; passion goes a long way and we appreciate that skills are transferable. Send us your application, we want to hear from you! Join the Coveolife! We encourage all candidates to apply regardless of, for example, age, gender, disability, gaps in CV, national or ethnic background. #LI-hybrid Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://www.coveo.com/en/company/careers/open-positions/research-and-development/fullstack-developer- intern-summer-2025/7807579002 Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
